channel.title: Cloud on Suraj Deshmukh
channel.description: Recent content in Cloud on Suraj Deshmukh

item.title: Deploying Kimi K2.5 on Azure: A Complete Guide to Running MoonshotAI's Model
item.description: Learn how to deploy and configure Kimi K2.5 on Azure AI Foundry with this step-by-step guide.

item.title: Deploying Grok-3 on Azure: A Complete Guide to Running xAI's Latest Model
item.description: Learn how to deploy and configure Grok-3 on Azure AI Foundry with this step-by-step guide. Set up your own instance of xAI's powerful language model in the cloud.
